tag_list: tungleme, marketing, tungle, iperceptions, social-media, analytics, voice-of-customer
overview: Jonathan has spent over 15 years helping diverse brands understand their audience and leverage technology and data to build better customer experiences. His work focuses on creating brand equity and building demand for companies and products of all sizes, including leading global players such as Bank of America, Verizon, Dell, Procter & Gamble, Ford, and Reebok. Data-driven to the core, Jonathan is a visionary who challenges the status quo. Moreover, he is a recognized authority in the spheres of web analytics, voice of customer, and conversion optimization. A prolific and sought-after speaker, blogger, and writer, his unique slant on digital marketing has been featured in several industry publications including 1to1 Magazine, ClickZ, DM News, and MediaPost.
